product_info.country_where_sold_colon: Country where the product is sold:
product_info.initial_book_code_description: The initial {eanPrefix} in this barcode is the Book-land EAN prefix, indicating that it is a book. The {eanPrefix} prefix, in this case, is assigned to the English language, but it doesn't specify a particular country.
